Index >  PDFCreator

PDFCreator

Description

Returns or sets the name of the application that created the original document (used when the PDF document is converted from another form);

Data type

<string>

Syntax

.PDFCreator = "Dynamic Web TWAIN";

Remarks

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode orErrorStringfor error information.

See also

PDFTitle
PDFAuthor
PDFSubject
PDFKeywords
PDFCreationDate
PDFModifiedDate
PDFProducer
